divs: sighting detailstime approx: 8:30 pm edt 10\31\2008 i went to the store and from the store parking lot noticed what at first glance appeared to be a flare. i live north of a military base so it would be normal. i watched it for a good minute and realized it was in the wrong area to be from the base. it also did not drop in altitude or flicker in any form. i proceeded to drive home. on the drive i kept an eye on it. it appeared to just sit there at about 300 500 feet, but it is hard to tell while driving. once on jones rd., i continued through the first curve, heading for the 90 degree right ahead. while in the first curve i had to dim my lights for an oncoming car. i was almost to the right turn and still watching the ufo, i switched on my high beams again. at that moment the ufo dropped in altitude and proceeded to move quickly to the right through the trees. i made the turn and watched through the trees as the ufo disappeared from sight. after arriving home i stood outside for about 10 minutes looking all around. i haven't at this time 10:12 pm 10\31\2008 viewed it again. this is my second time in 25 years viewing a ufo. the other in 1983 was in the same county and did about the same thing.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cataula, Georgia
This sighting has never been favorited.
